verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me again, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

What mean ye, that ye use <WH4911> <WH8802> this proverb <WH4912> concerning the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The fathers <WH1> have eaten <WH398> <WH8799> sour grapes <WH1155>, and the children's <WH1121> teeth <WH8127> are set on edge <WH6949> <WH8799> ?
As I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, ye shall not have occasion any more to use <WH4911> <WH8800> this proverb <WH4912> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

Behold, all souls <WH5315> are mine; as the soul <WH5315> of the father <WH1>, so also the soul <WH5315> of the son <WH1121> is mine: the soul <WH5315> that sinneth <WH2398> <WH8802>, it shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>.
But if a man <WH376> be just <WH6662>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> that which is Torahful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>,

And hath not eaten <WH398> <WH8804> upon the mountains <WH2022>, neither hath lifted up <WH5375> <WH8804> his eyes <WH5869> to the idols <WH1544> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, neither hath defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> his neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>, neither hath come near <WH7126> <WH8799> to a menstruous <WH5079> woman <WH802>,

And hath not oppressed <WH3238> <WH8686> any <WH376>, but hath restored <WH7725> <WH8686> to the debtor <WH2326> his pledge <WH2258>, hath spoiled <WH1497> <WH8799> none by violence <WH1500>, hath given <WH5414> <WH8799> his bread <WH3899> to the hungry <WH7457>, and hath covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the naked <WH5903> with a garment <WH899>;

He that hath not given forth <WH5414> <WH8799> upon usury <WH5392>, neither hath taken <WH3947> <WH8799> any increase <WH8636>, that hath withdrawn <WH7725> <WH8686> his hand <WH3027> from iniquity <WH5766>, hath executed <WH6213> <WH8799> true <WH571> judgment <WH4941> between man <WH376> and man <WH376>,

Hath walked <WH1980> <WH8762> in my statutes <WH2708>, and hath kept <WH8104> <WH8804> my judgments <WH4941>, to deal <WH6213> <WH8800> truly <WH571>; he is just <WH6662>, he shall surely <WH2421> <WH8800> live <WH2421> <WH8799>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

If he beget <WH3205> <WH8689> a son <WH1121> that is a robber <WH6530>, a shedder <WH8210> <WH8802> of blood <WH1818>, and that doeth <WH6213> <WH8804> the like <WH251> to any one <WH259> of these things,
And that doeth <WH6213> <WH8804> not any of those duties, but even hath eaten <WH398> <WH8804> upon the mountains <WH2022>, and defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> his neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>,

Hath oppressed <WH3238> <WH8689> the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>, hath spoiled <WH1497> <WH8804> by violence <WH1500>, hath not restored <WH7725> <WH8686> the pledge <WH2258>, and hath lifted up <WH5375> <WH8804> his eyes <WH5869> to the idols <WH1544>, hath committed <WH6213> <WH8804> abomination <WH8441>,

Hath given forth <WH5414> <WH8804> upon usury <WH5392>, and hath taken <WH3947> <WH8804> increase <WH8636>: shall he then live <WH2425> <WH8804>? he shall not live <WH2421> <WH8799>: he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> all these abominations <WH8441>; he shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8714>; his blood <WH1818> shall be upon him.

Now, lo, if he beget <WH3205> <WH8689> a son <WH1121>, that seeth <WH7200> <WH8799> all his father's <WH1> sins <WH2403> which he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804>, and considereth <WH7200> <WH8799>, and doeth <WH6213> <WH8799> not such like <WH2004>,

That hath not eaten <WH398> <WH8804> upon the mountains <WH2022>, neither hath lifted up <WH5375> <WH8804> his eyes <WH5869> to the idols <WH1544> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, hath not defiled <WH2930> <WH8765> his neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>,

Neither hath oppressed <WH3238> <WH8689> any <WH376>, hath not withholden <WH2254> <WH8804> the pledge <WH2258>, neither hath spoiled <WH1497> <WH8804> by violence <WH1500>, but hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> his bread <WH3899> to the hungry <WH7457>, and hath covered <WH3680> <WH8765> the naked <WH5903> with a garment <WH899>,

That hath taken off <WH7725> <WH8689> his hand <WH3027> from the poor <WH6041>, that hath not received <WH3947> <WH8804> usury <WH5392> nor increase <WH8636>, hath executed <WH6213> <WH8804> my judgments <WH4941>, hath walked <WH1980> <WH8804> in my statutes <WH2708>; he shall not die <WH4191> <WH8799> for the iniquity <WH5771> of his father <WH1>, he shall surely <WH2421> <WH8800> live <WH2421> <WH8799>.

As for his father <WH1>, because he cruelly <WH6233> oppressed <WH6231> <WH8804>, spoiled <WH1497> <WH8804> his brother <WH251> by violence <WH1499>, and did <WH6213> <WH8804> that which is not good <WH2896> among <WH8432> his people <WH5971>, lo, even he shall die <WH4191> <WH8801> in his iniquity <WH5771>.

Yet say <WH559> <WH8804> ye, Why? doth not the son <WH1121> bear <WH5375> <WH8804> the iniquity <WH5771> of the father <WH1>? When the son <WH1121> hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> that which is Torahful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>, and hath kept <WH8104> <WH8804> all my statutes <WH2708>, and hath done <WH6213> <WH8799> them, he shall surely <WH2421> <WH8800> live <WH2421> <WH8799>.

The soul <WH5315> that sinneth <WH2398> <WH8802>, it shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>. The son <WH1121> shall not bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the iniquity <WH5771> of the father <WH1>, neither shall the father <WH1> bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the iniquity <WH5771> of the son <WH1121>: the righteousness <WH6666> of the righteous <WH6662> shall be upon him, and the wickedness <WH7564> of the wicked <WH7563> shall be upon him.

But if the wicked <WH7563> will turn <WH7725> <WH8799> from all his sins <WH2403> that he hath committed <WH6213> <WH8804>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8804> all my statutes <WH2708>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> that which is Torahful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>, he shall surely <WH2421> <WH8800> live <WH2421> <WH8799>, he shall not die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

All his transgressions <WH6588> that he hath committed <WH6213> <WH8804>, they shall not be mentioned <WH2142> <WH8735> unto him: in his righteousness <WH6666> that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> he shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>.

Have I any pleasure <WH2654> <WH8799> at all <WH2654> <WH8800> that the wicked <WH7563> should die <WH4194>? saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>: and not that he should return <WH7725> <WH8800> from his ways <WH1870>, and live <WH2421> <WH8804> ?

But when the righteous <WH6662> turneth away <WH7725> <WH8800> from his righteousness <WH6666>, and committeth <WH6213> <WH8804> iniquity <WH5766>, and doeth <WH6213> <WH8799> according to all the abominations <WH8441> that the wicked <WH7563> man doeth <WH6213> <WH8804>, shall he live <WH2425> <WH8804>? All his righteousness <WH6666> that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> shall not be mentioned <WH2142> <WH8735>: in his trespass <WH4603> <WH8804> that he hath trespassed <WH4604>, and in his sin <WH2403> that he hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, in them shall he die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Yet ye say <WH559> <WH8804>, The way <WH1870> of the YY <WH136> is not equal <WH8505> <WH8735>. Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> now, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; Is not my way <WH1870> equal <WH8505> <WH8735>? are not your ways <WH1870> unequal <WH8505> <WH8735> ?

When a righteous <WH6662> man turneth away <WH7725> <WH8800> from his righteousness <WH6666>, and committeth <WH6213> <WH8804> iniquity <WH5766>, and dieth <WH4191> <WH8804> in them; for his iniquity <WH5766> that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> shall he die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Again, when the wicked <WH7563> man turneth away <WH7725> <WH8800> from his wickedness <WH7564> that he hath committed <WH6213> <WH8804>, and doeth <WH6213> <WH8799> that which is Torahful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>, he shall save <WH2421> his soul <WH5315> alive <WH2421> <WH8762>.

Because he considereth <WH7200> <WH8799>, and turneth away <WH7725> <WH8799> from all his transgressions <WH6588> that he hath committed <WH6213> <WH8804>, he shall surely <WH2421> <WH8800> live <WH2421> <WH8799>, he shall not die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Yet saith <WH559> <WH8804> the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, The way <WH1870> of the YY <WH136> is not equal <WH8505> <WH8735>. O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, are not my ways <WH1870> equal <WH8505> <WH8735>? are not your ways <WH1870> unequal <WH8505> <WH8735> ?

Therefore I will judge <WH8199> <WH8799> you, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, every one <WH376> according to his ways <WH1870>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>. Repent <WH7725> <WH8798>, and turn <WH7725> <WH8685> yourselves from all your transgressions <WH6588>; so iniquity <WH5771> shall not be your ruin <WH4383>.

Cast away <WH7993> <WH8685> from you all your transgressions <WH6588>, whereby ye have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804>; and make <WH6213> <WH8798> you a new <WH2319> heart <WH3820> and a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307>: for why will ye die <WH4191> <WH8799>, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> ?

For I have no pleasure <WH2654> <WH8799> in the death <WH4194> of him that dieth <WH4191> <WH8801>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>: wherefore turn <WH7725> <WH8685> yourselves, and live <WH2421> <WH8798> ye.
